html:
While you're waiting for that new Megadeth record, why not get yourself some S-tier threads?

Megadeth has teamed up with Half-Sumo for a whole new line of fightware merchandise that frankly looks cool as hell. All the merch celebrates Megadeth's Killing Is My Business… and Business Is Good! turning 40 years old, and ties in perfectly with the fact that Megadeth frontman Dave Mustaine is a lifelong martial artist that holds black belts in Taekwondo and Ukidokan Karate, as well as a brown belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

"To see the raw energy of our first album translated into gear that's built for the mat is a thrilling moment," said Megadeth frontman Dave Mustaine. "Half Sumo honored the spirit of Killing Is My Business… perfectly."

"Megadeth's debut was a declaration of war on the status quo," said Half-Sumo founders Luigi Scarcella Perino and Alberto Marchetti. "It was technically brilliant, unapologetically aggressive, and it set a new standard for heavy music. That is the same energy we inject into our gear—the spirit of the underdog fighting a bigger battle. This collection is for them."

The Megadeth x Half Sumo Killing Is My Business… and Business Is Good! 40th Anniversary capsule will be released in four highly limited waves, all available right here. They are:

Wave 1: The Streets – Available Now, June 12, 2025: Limited-edition streetwear marking the 40th anniversary of Megadeth's debut.

  • "Katana Vic" Tee – Bold graphic tee featuring reimagined Vic Rattlehead in Half Sumo style.
  • Rattlehead Ronin Tee – Old-school sand-colored tee with a ronin-style Vic graphic.
  • Half Sumo x Megadeth Anniversary Logo Tee – Oversized Vic face + vintage Megadeth logo.
  • "Katana Vic" Pullover Zip Hoodie – Heavyweight zip hoodie with full "Katana Vic" artwork.
  • Rattlehead Ronin Hoodie – Shiitake-colored hoodie with detailed ronin Vic print.
  • "Mechanix" Tech Joggers – Fleece joggers with clean Anniversary logo under the knee.

Wave 2: The Mats – Releasing July 2025: Combat-ready performance gear.

  • "Rattlehead" Nogi Fightwear Kit – Rashguard and shorts for MMA/Jiu-Jitsu, with sublimated design, moisture-wicking, and anti-odor tech.

Wave 3: The Dojo – Releasing August 2025: The centerpiece of the collection.

  • "Chosen Ones" Custom Kimono – Pearl weave gi with direct embroidery, custom lining, and collector's edition gi bag.

Wave 4: The Arsenal – Releasing September 2025: Accessories built from signature materials.

  • "Looking Down the Cross" Bomber Jacket – Kimono fabric bomber with satin lining and full-back embroidery.
  • Vic Rattlehead Tactical Backpack – Rugged backpack made from gi fabric with custom patches and reinforced compartments.
